none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on May 11, 2023 Description from Terminal Escape:
 You know, it's just so...sweet. The songs are good, subtly catchy and innocent in the dreamiest way. But CRABAPPLE were just...sweet. If this had dropped in the 1991 Simple Machines world then we'd still be talking about them (and fiending over the records) today, but instead the were from '10s San Jose and here's this really good tape you should enjoy.IS IT YOU
